annotations.description:
An example CakePHP application with a MySQL database. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/cakephp-ex/blob/master/README.md.

WARNING: Any data stored will be lost upon pod destruction. Only use this template for testing.
annotations.openshift.io/long-description: This template defines resources needed to develop a CakePHP application, including a build configuration, application deployment configuration, and database deployment configuration.  The database is stored in non-persistent storage, so this configuration should be used for experimental purposes only.
